resources.string: Egypt\'s capital with Egyption Museum artifacts, plus the Pyramids of Giza G Great Sphinx monument
The Egyptian pyramids are ancient pyramid-shaped masonry structures located in Egypt. As of November 2008, sources cite either 118 or 138 as the number of identified Egyptian pyramids
The Al-Hussain Mosque is a mosque built in 1154 The mosque is located in Cairo, Egypt, near the Khan El-Khalili bazaar
Its a good place for Relaxing
The Mosque of Ibn Tulun is located in Cairo, Egypt. It is the oldest mosque in the city surviving in its original form, and is the largest mosque in Cairo in terms of land area.

This click Will move to an Activity that show more details about That City

Alexandria is a Mediterranean port city in Egypt. During the Hellenistic period, it was home to a lighthouse ranking among the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World as well as a storied library. Today the library is reincarnated in the disc-shaped, ultramodern Bibliotheca Alexandrina.
Capital of Egypt Cairo, Egypt’s sprawling capital, is set on the Nile River. At its heart is Tahrir Square and the vast Egyptian Museum
Giza is a year-round destination. A popular time to visit is Aug, the height of summer.

Aswan, a city on the Nile River, has been southern Egypt’s strategic and commercial gateway since antiquity. It contains significant archaeological sites like the Philae temple complex, on Agilkia Island near the landmark Aswan Dam.

Healthy uses the freshest Egyptian local produce to create simple and flavourful gourmet interpretations of Egyptian street food
